alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Tazewell; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Piatt, northeastern De Witt, Vermilion, east central Tazewell, southern McLean and Champaign Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danville to near Farmer City to near Deer Creek. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tilton around 530 PM CDT. Danville around 535 PM CDT. Westville and Belgium around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mahomet, Minier, Mansfield and Stanford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 146 and 162. Interstate 57 between mile markers 231 and 256. Interstate 72 between mile markers 172 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 124 and 125, and between mile markers 128 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Tazewell; Vermilion
